otfk.title: OTFK ONTU
otfk.description: The Methodical Cabinet website is a project designed to support the educational process by providing teachers with a platform to collaborate, share resources, and exchange knowledge effectively.

todoList.title: To-Do List
todoList.description: A simple and elegant task manager that helps you organize your daily plans. Features: add, edit, delete tasks, choose a date from the calendar, and switch between light and dark themes. All tasks are saved in LocalStorage â€” nothing gets lost after reloading the page.
